text: was a Japanese politician of the Democratic Party of Japan. He was a member of the House of Representatives in the Diet (national legislature). He was born in Sapporo, Hokkaido, Japan. He was elected to the House of Representatives in 2000. ==References== Category:2021 deaths Category:1942 births Category:Politicians from Hokkaido Category:People from Sapporo Category:Ministers of health, labour and welfare of Japan
title: Wakio Mitsui
